text: Princess Srinagarindra (; ; 21 October 1900 â€“ 18 July 1995) born Sangwan Talapat (; ) was a member of the Royal Thai Family. She was part of the House of Mahidol. She was the mother of Princess Galyani Vadhana, King Ananda Mahidol (Rama VIII), and King Bhumibol Adulyadej (Rama IX). She was the paternal grandmother of King Vajiralongkorn (Rama X). Her formal name and title was Somdet Phra Srinagarindra Boromarajajonani (). ==References== Category:1900 births Category:1995 deaths Category:Thai royalty Category:Princes and princesses
title: Srinagarindra
